name: AFITOP100MovieQuotes
0:
”Alexa open Top Movie Quotes”
”Alexa open Top Movie Quotes and say a quote.”
”Alexa get me a quote from Top Movie quotes.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top movie quotes
des:
A fun skill that attempts to have Alexa say a quote from a famous movie. Every quote is spoken by Alexa, or makes use of her built-in functionality. You won't find any movie audio clips here! Obviously, results vary from quote to quote; some are amazingly accurate and will sync perfectly with the actual quote, while others are humorously bad. Definitely not the most ground-breaking skill available on Alexa enabled devices, but it is a fun example of what can be done with her speech using various Amazon services.

HOW TO USE: 
Simply just say, "Alexa, open Top Movie Quotes", after the short introduction just ask Alexa to "get a quote". At anytime you can ask for help by saying, "help" or have Alexa repeat the last quote by saying, "repeat" or "say again".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
